name: Kuzhi Paniyaram
description: Fluffy fried dumplings made from leftover dosa batter.
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add curry leaves, green chilies, and ginger
Add onions and saut√© until translucent
Mix this tempering into dosa batter
Add coriander leaves and adjust salt
Heat paniyaram pan, add oil in each mould
Pour batter into moulds
Cook on medium flame until golden on bottom
Flip and cook other side
Serve hot with chutney

name: Mangalore Buns
description: Soft, sweet banana-flavored fried bread from Mangalore.
instructions: Mix mashed banana, yogurt, sugar, and salt
Add flour and baking soda
Knead to soft dough without water
Cover and rest for 2 hours
Divide into small balls
Roll each ball into thick disc
Heat oil for deep frying
Fry until puffed and golden brown
Drain excess oil
Serve hot with coconut chutney or sambar

name: Prawn Curry
description: Coastal style prawn curry with coconut milk and spices.
instructions: Marinate prawns with turmeric and salt for 15 minutes
Heat oil, add curry leaves and onions
Saut√© until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and fry
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add all spice powders and fry
Add tamarind paste and little water
Add prawns and cook for 5 minutes
Add coconut milk and simmer for 5 minutes
Serve hot with rice

name: Ennai Kathirikai
description: Stuffed brinjal curry in tangy tamarind gravy.
instructions: Dry roast coriander, cumin, sesame, chilies, peanuts, and coconut
Grind to fine paste with tamarind
Slit brinjals keeping stem intact
Stuff masala inside brinjals
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves
Add stuffed brinjals
Cover and cook on low heat
Turn occasionally until brinjals are cooked
Add remaining masala with water
Simmer until gravy thickens
Serve with rice

name: Vendakkai Puli Kuzhambu
description: Tangy okra curry with tamarind and South Indian spices.
instructions: Extract tamarind juice
Heat oil, fry okra until crispy, set aside
In same oil, add mustard and fenugreek seeds
Add curry leaves and onions, saut√©
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add tamarind juice, sambar powder, turmeric
Add salt and 1 cup water
Boil until raw smell goes
Add fried okra
Simmer for 5 minutes
Serve with rice

name: Parotta
description: Flaky layered flatbread, popular in Tamil Nadu and Kerala.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and salt
Add egg, milk, oil, and knead with water to soft dough
Rest for 30 minutes covered
Divide into balls and apply oil
Roll very thin, apply ghee
Fold into pleats and coil into spiral
Rest for 10 minutes
Roll out gently into thick disc
Cook on hot tawa until golden spots appear
Flip and cook other side
Clap between hands to separate layers
Serve hot with kurma or salna

name: Beetroot Poriyal
description: Stir-fried beetroot with coconut and spices.
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add green chilies and curry leaves
Add grated beetroot and turmeric
Add salt and mix well
Cover and cook on low heat for 10 minutes
Add grated coconut
Mix well and cook for 2 minutes
Serve hot with rice

name: Cabbage Thoran
description: Kerala style dry cabbage curry with coconut.
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds and urad dal
Add curry leaves and green chilies
Add cabbage, turmeric, and salt
Mix well and cover
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes
Add grated coconut
Mix well and cook for 2 minutes
Serve with rice

name: Vadai Curry
description: Lentil fritters dunked in spicy tangy gravy.
instructions: Soak vadas in warm salted water for 15 minutes, squeeze gently
Extract tamarind juice
Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves
Add onions and saut√© until golden
Add ginger-garlic paste and fry
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add all spice powders and fry
Add tamarind juice and 2 cups water
Bring to boil and simmer for 10 minutes
Add squeezed vadas and simmer for 5 minutes
Garnish with coriander
Serve with rice

name: Rava Kesari
description: Sweet semolina pudding with ghee, nuts, and saffron.
instructions: Roast rava in 2 tbsp ghee until aromatic
Boil water with saffron and color
Add roasted rava slowly while stirring
Cook until rava absorbs water
Add sugar and mix well
Keep stirring and add remaining ghee gradually
Fry cashews and raisins in ghee separately
Add to kesari along with cardamom powder
Cook until ghee separates
Serve warm
